core.objective: Execute exactly K evils shown by the village objective.

disguise_visibility.truthful_view: Truthful characters see through Disguises and register Demons/Puppets as Evil.
disguise_visibility.lying_or_corrupted_view: Lying/Corrupted characters see the Disguised role and will mis-register Puppets as Good.

corruption.effect: Character lies and their ability does not work. Alignment does not change.

notes: Puppeteer creates exactly one adjacent Puppet from a VILLAGER if possible. If no adjacent Villager, no Puppet.

reveal.effect: Shows the claimed (possibly Disguised) role and triggers that card’s 'info' (if any).

execute.effect: Kills a seat and reveals the TRUE role and alignment (removes Disguise).

knight.if_corrupted: Dies and deals +4 damage to the player.

logic_terms.pairs_of_evil: Number of adjacent evil–evil pairs (for Knitter).
logic_terms.halves_for_architect: When N is even, both exact midpoints are counted on each side.

omissions: No day/night or Endless-mode refresh rules.
No scoring/health text; puzzle solver doesn’t require it.
